name: Jessica Spivey
text:
Please do not waste your time or money here! Sure, the food truck may be awesome but the restaurant is terrible! I waited 40 minutes for 4 tacos and a quesadilla and they only had two tables in the restaurant. There were 4 employees. I kept asking how much longer, and one girl said "I'm not sure, we got backed up and I realize you may be in a hurry but it'll be ready soon!" They desperately need to work on their customer service and staff. I can't imagine how long the wait would be if they actually had a full restaurant of customers! Its a good concept but I dont think they were ready for a full service restaurant or all that it entails. I won't be back!

Thomas, you are absolutely right! I was in your establishment as a door dash driver. Your employee advised me of your policy and I left and returned 10 minutes later with my insulated bag, per your policy. Upon arriving with the bag, I waited 35 minutes for the food to be ready. It took your employees a total of 45 minutes to make 4 tacos and a quesadilla. Your delivery driver left and returned and I was still waiting for the order. Another door dash driver came and left and I was still waiting for the order. A car side to go came and left and I was still waiting for my order. It became increasingly frustrating because while waiting for the order I was assigned to pick up, I was unable to be available for other orders. This one assignment took over an hour of my time and ultimately messed up the potential money I could have made because the service at your establishment is negligently noteworthy. If I was a paying customer I would be furious to wait an hour for over priced food and mediocore service. First impressions are everything and everyone that visits your restaurant is a potential paying customer. If my experience would have been different, dont you think I would have returned as a paying customer? I can understand why your employees are uneager to service patrons, as the owner has repeatedly rudely reacted to all negative reviews, this pattern, as another patron noted, is highly unprofessional! The restaurant business is not easy and making responses to negative reviews such as you have will not help your business. I'm so glad you contacted Door Dash so I had a chance to respond to your threatening Facebook message for me to take down my negative review.

Ladies and gentlemen, please be weary of writing negative reviews to this restaurant because the owner will threaten you privately. The time you took to look me up on Facebook and message me could have been spent training your employees to be more attentive to any person entering your establishment. I am appalled that a restaurant owner would conduct themselves in such an unprofessional manner. The right response would have been, "I'm sorry you had a bad experience, please let us know what we can do going forward for you to possibly return." However, your response solidifies the unprofessionalism and disregard for others opinions and ultimately their money. I wish you the best of luck, as you are going to need it to stay in business for the long haul.

resp.text: Jessica. Thank you for finally adjusting your review to reflect the truth. We apologize you feel like you waited so long but our longest wait time that night was 25 minutes. Our direct paying  customers have priority over any 3rd party deliveries, we did no such thing has threaten you on Facebook, merely asked for you to take down your fake review as a customer point of view. Now that you changed your review, it finally reflects your true point of view. I will always defend my business when I do not believe I was in the wrong. If this was such a bad issue last night, you should have asked for a manager instead of constantly complaining and raising your voice in our establishment.

name: Matt McKechnie
text: Ordered food from DoorDash on a whim because we wanted to try something new. And this did not disappoint. I was completely amazed by the quality and flavor of the food and highly recommend. I'll be coming in to dine now also -- amazing; thank you.

name: Chung-thuy Pham
text:
We tried the FS Burrito, fish taco, and the chorizo taco. Everything was so delicious, I love the brussels sprout side that we got too.

One thing I want to mention is their to-go packaging! Their packaging was very streamlined to minimalize waste, it definitely seems like they have put thought into this and I appreciate their solution. If possible, they should include an option in their online ordering to exclude plastic utensils as well

name: kenric smith
text: Loved the truck and love the physical location!  Their creations are amazing.  I will a frequent customer.  My only negative is they are a little pricey but overall, completely worth the price.

name: Tyler Parker
text: The most unique tacos around! The food hits the spot Everytime and the staff is extremely friendly!

name: Loves to Travel
text: This is not a Mexican Resteraunt and not a Bbq joint a better name for the place would be straight out of Austin.  Brisket was perfect and all ingredients very fresh.  I hope Huntsville is ready for them I will do my part!

name: Brady Doepke
text: Always a great place. Their items marked spicy aren't too spicy, except the Russian roulette. That taco deserves another pepper marker on the menu. But I do love it too.

name: Zach G
text: The food is okay but the experience leaves much to desire. Expensive menu for what you're getting. You can expect to spend close to $20 for a lunch with a drink (after tip). Also, this is one of those places that charge you for each soft drink you order. Luckily I ordered sweet tea (which was actually good) but my friend had $5 in charges for two Cokes when the bill arrived. We won't be going back.

name: Justin Greene
text: Tasty food!

name: William Moore
text: Everything I had was great. There green chile Mac and cheese is to die for

name: Weston Uptagrafft
text: Love having a local Tex Mex place in South Huntsville. We were hooked on their food truck and couldn't have been more stoked when they opened a brick and mortar location so close to us. Great specials that at to their variety. Chicken and waffles is awesome, Russian roulette, etc.. support local!!!

name: Jr Kelly
text: Highly recommend everyone try this place.

name: Neil Young
text: The staff was very friendly and helpful and the portions were very good for the price.  The atmosphere was very friendly and fun but the service was a bit slow on the food coming out.  If you are drinking and chatting it isn't bad but I wouldn't expect the food to hit the table fast. The drinks were good and had some good options and it was a really nice place to visit.  I'll definitely go back and see if things get better.

name: Marie McNew
text: The service and food are excellent!! The atmosphere is very chill, theres bar type seating as well as tables with both chairs and booth seating. They also have a really nice outdoor seating area that had a few small games the kids could use while we waited for our food. I'd definitely recommend to anyone who likes flavorful and spicy foods, yum! (They also serve alcoholic drinks and have a nice kids menu...great for the whole family!)

name: Matthew Henry
text: The food is really good. The spice isn't hot for the sake of being hot, but actually has a nice flavor (also, not very hot - you may want to add some spice.) I particularly appreciate the dedicated vegan section, and I'm looking forward to the weather cooling down because the patio looks really nice. Pay attention to the hours - they're not open on Mondays.

name: Katy Frees
text: Got it via Grubsouth tonight and the ETA was quicker than expected. The food was as good as ever (which is REALLY REALLY good) If you have not tried it, I’d recommend the Southern Belle taco or really anything else in the menu.

name: Messi Jessi
text: Get the BBQ brussels!! They are incredible! Their piper and leaf tea is delicious.

name: Wayne D Chappell Jr
text: My first time to eat dinner here was great!  All of my selections were fabulous and the service was great!

name: Marsha Atchley
text: The service was the worse I ever had. The waitress wanted us to wait to order because they did not have enough cooks and there was 8 of us. So all the people that came in after us got to order first. Does that make any sense?  That was 5 table before us, some got there order, paid and left before we even got to order. We were there over 2 hours for a tacos and burritos. Not good. Can't say I will ever be back. Way to pricey for what we got.

resp.text: Thank you for bringing these issues to our attention. It is too bad you told us everything was fine while you were here and talked to the owner directly. We could have fixed whatever the miscommunication was while in the restaurant.

name: shasta kimeo
text: Give them lots credit for original recipes.

name: James McKeen
text: I seriously can’t say enough good things about Fire & Spice!  I was briefly in Huntsville visiting family and working.  This place was just down the block, so I decided to check it out for lunch.  I got the smoked bologna sandwich and was totally blown away!  The meat was incredible, and the combination of their sweet slaw, their pimento cheese, and the mustard was the perfect complement to this hearty, comfort-food sandwich.  While complimenting the owners, they told me about some cool sounding tacos they make with fried chicken and pimento cheese, but they only make it as a special.  They are planning on adding it to their permanent menu but hadn’t done so yet.  I asked them if they would consider making it for me if I came back for lunch the next day, and they totally did!  It was fantastic!  These guys have a real gift for flavor.  And just when I thought they couldn’t be any cooler, they doubled down and made me their fried pickles as a side (also something they have only experimented with so far and wasn’t on the menu yet).  They make their own pickles, they are spicy and thinly sliced and perfect!  Since they are so thin, they fry up like chips and are mind-blowing good!  On top of all of this, they have many gluten free and vegan options.  So cool to have a place with options that my family members could eat and still serves food that I actually WANT to eat, as well!

name: CGL Phattimus_Prime
text: Had the southern Bell Taco today, the best taco I've ever eaten in my life started out with two ended up with three. And the service was excellent. I highly recommend coming here any chance you get for lunch or dinner.

name: Christopher Yates
text: The staff is always super friendly. And the food. The food is so good! 10/10 would recomend.

name: Haley 'Jonas'
text: This is a very great restaurant! The staff is absolutely amazing, they are super friendly! I’m obsessed with the fried pickles they make in house! I honestly can’t have enough of them!!

name: Heath Skelton
text: The food was pretty good, not outstanding, but quite overpriced. $14 for a pretty standard size burrito is pretty crazy, and while I enjoyed it, I can't imagine paying that much for it again. I don't think I will go back here. The appetizer we got (Fire and Spice Dip) was also fine but undersized for the price. The happy hour beer deals (50% off drafts) are good.

name: Lora King
text: Keep finding more and more on their menu that I like! (And I'm very sensitive to spicy food.) Rice bowls, good! Brisket, good! Kid meals, good (and cheap)! Seating is a little uncomfortable, especially for someone with shorter limbs. No free refills on sodas, but they come in glass bottles. Always clean and good service each time.

name: Chuck Graham
text: The tacos were outstanding. Santa Fe was incredible,  Southern Belle was scrumptious, and Texan was excellent. A most enjoyable dinner! And the service was pretty good too!

name: blondo4620
text: Wow! Delicious food and really nice staff.

name: Robert Culver
text: Love the Rattler.  Food is good.  People are nice.  Strange you can only order a bloody Mary on Sunday!

name: Curtis Lindsay
text: Best brisket in town — light years beyond some chains we could mention — and both the macaroni & cheese and the brussels sprouts were out of this world.

name: James Ian Dunn
text: The food selection was awesome. Quality was top notch. Good beer selection too.

name: Aurora Yancey
text: Can I say WOW?!? What an awesome gym for South Huntsville!! If you haven't been here then treat yourself to what you deserve. This is a very unique place that supports a great experience.

name: ashley lowder
text: This is easily one of the best places to eat in South Huntsville. It's clean, the staff are friendly, the owner is great to talk with, and the food is incredible! I'm from the southwest and have been searching for a place that I can call "good". This place is great! Go try it!

name: Chuck Graham
text: The tacos were outstanding. Santa Fe was incredible,  Southern Belle was scrumptious, and Texan was excellent. A most enjoyable dinner! And the service was pretty good too!

name: Chris Alan
text: Friendly staff. Great help with the menu. The Rattler burrito was awesome. Little spicy, but not too hot. Was there for a business lunch, but I will definitely be bringing my family back.

name: Robert Culver
text: Love the Rattler.  Food is good.  People are nice.  Strange you can only order a bloody Mary on Sunday!

name: Curtis Lindsay
text: Best brisket in town — light years beyond some chains we could mention — and both the macaroni & cheese and the brussels sprouts were out of this world.

name: Aurora Yancey
text: Can I say WOW?!? What an awesome gym for South Huntsville!! If you haven't been here then treat yourself to what you deserve. This is a very unique place that supports a great experience.

name: James Ian Dunn
text: The food selection was awesome. Quality was top notch. Good beer selection too.

name: jett West
text: This was a special surprise.  Awesome food! Service was great they were so nice and polite.  Such a great experience.  We are taking food to go it is so good. I can't say enough about this place. Now the Russian Roulette is hot as hell.  They tell you it is but I have heard that before.  They are telling you the truth but so flavorful. The Lone Star was very good.  Brisket was tasty

name: Natasha Baker
text: Nice and clean restaurant. The aroma that hits you when you walk in is incredible. The owners are super nice and the mac & cheese and poblano potato salad are delicious!

name: James Kemp
text: The brisket is off the chain!!!! Everything was awesome!!!! Will be back for sure!!!

name: Shauna Riden
text: Great food! Fast and friendly! Phoned in our office lunch today and it was ready in about 15 mins. Highly recomend Fire and Spice!

name: Lauren Ruffner
text: One of my favorite places!!! I take everyone I know here!! I love that they have vegan options for myself. Taco Tuesday is really cool too, you can mix and match any 3 tacos for a discounted amount!! I love the staff and crew that works here they are always friendly and nice!! I HIGHLY recommend trying it! I personally walk around with to go menus to let my friends know to go try it out!!

name: Rachel Hawke
text:
I love their food! They do deliver which is nice (although I don't live in the delivery zone anymore 😭) Since we live in Madison and their storefront is in South Huntsville going there is quite a trek. Some pilgrimages are worth it. Fire and Spice offers a unique twist on TexMex and I love a good twist. A new perspective on comforting flavors.

The serving sizes are definitely large and can rarely finish in one sitting. Same with my Husband. Definitely get your money's worth.

UPDATE 3/30/21: This was my first visit since COVID and this place is still amazing! I have not eaten anything I don’t like. The staff was friendly and everyone was practicing safety precautions. I felt comfortable eating on their patio.

name: Chantaine Rhoe-Bulluck
text: Awesome inspired food menu, great prices and   welcoming staff

name: Nick Vaughan
text: I loved the food truck so naturally the restaurant should be just as good if not better right? Wrong! There is no reason this place needs servers first of all. Second the quality of food send to have taken a significant dip upon transitioning to brick and mortar. Lastly the burrito had a "squeaky" chicken texture. We will not be going back.

name: Jon Brown
text: Very good, unique flavors! Excellent service. The smoked bologna is delicious!

name: Alex Patterson
text: Great food and kind employees!

name: Scott Moss
text: Let me start out by saying I admire anyone who has the gumption to make a go at running a restaurant. Maybe I am just an old man who likes the chain burritos. I ordered the fire and spice chicken burrito, wife ordered a taco (brisket). My wife thought the brisket was delicious. I would say the burrito was not as good as Chipotle  or even Moes. Just my opinion, not that good for the money. It took us almost an hour to get our food, it was busy not crazy. The restaurant appeared very understaffed, I felt for the waitress.

name: Kandi Nichols
text: The staff was awesome: friendly and attentive. The food was fresh and cooked well. A healthy alternative. The prices are higher than I expected: about $30 for two to eat there. We have leftovers for another meal, but overall I do not think I'd go back again. We were disappointed with the food: we expected higher quality at that price.

name: Adam B
text: Got the brisket and egg burrito off the brunch menu was it was Delicious! The salsa was good. Maybe a bit pricey but high quality food.

name: S T
text:
BEST BRISKET IN TOWN! HIGHLY RECOMMEND
Small but cozy clean well maintained atmosphere. Staff very friendly and prompt. No waiting on a Friday night! The brisket platter was exceptional! Very fresh, juicy, flavorful, and fork-tender with just the right amount of marbling. Entrees come with Texas Toast and two sides. If you like BBQ style Fried Okra, Charro beans, guac, and potato salad then you're in for a real treat. They are amazing! Customers would be better served with fountain drinks/refills instead of bottles. But its a small inconvenience considering the great BBQ quality. Unfortunately, ribs are not on the menu.  Entree prices range from $14-$18. Definitely looking forward to our next visit hungry for more.

name: Jon Fox
text: Large portions of spicy, smokey Tex Mex with a scrappy food truck heritage. Great vegan options. Go here and eat happy. Casual dining. Prepare to be messy and satisfied.

name: Troy Dunning
text: First time in the restaurant. The Rodeo brisket burrito was decent (too much pinto beans for me), service was good, and the place was clean. Looking forward to trying more from the menu.

name: Chris Hall
text: Excellent selection of interesting tacos, many of which feature house-made bbq. I found the brisket and pulled pork to be excellent, and the fried chicken taco is awesome as well. They also have a selection of beers on tap as well as cans and bottles. I really wish they had a soda fountain, and the price is slightly steep, but the food is quite good.

name: Matthew Jaeger
text: Great brisket and salsa verde! You've gotta try it!

name: Desiree Gaiser
text: Lovely service, great selection for all tastes. Had a good time!

name: allen H
text: Absolute melt in your mouth Brisket, my wife and I will return and bring friends.

name: Taylor H
text: Disaster service, over priced food, SLOWWWWW with an empty store, but it does have good flavor. Skip this place, there are plenty of other taco joints much better.

resp.text: Thank you for brining this issue to our attention. Next time you have an issue, regardless of where it is, you should probably ask to speak with someone in charge so we can help take care of the problem at its sources.

name: John Madderra
text: Barbecue brussels sprouts rock!

name: Justin Williams
text:
Great food and friendly staff!

The a la carte menu is a great change. You can pick your own mix for lunch or dinner and get exactly what you want. The Russian Roulette is excellent with pork. It's hot, but the flavors come through without being overpowered by the heat.

Thanks for another delicious meal. Fire and Spice is one of my top three favorite places to dine.

name: Dan De Jong
text: The staff was phenomenal. Even so much as to help me decorate my wife's birthday cupcakes that the store didn't have time to. I would recommend Fire & Spice to anyone looking for a great meal and friendly staff.

name: allen H
text: Absolute melt in your mouth Brisket, my wife and I will return and bring friends.

name: Madison Bowersox
text: The flavors were there but serving warm food in a cold metal bowl therefore makes it colder. The food from the truck is definitely better temperature wise. They don't really have a true mild option for others that have issues with the spice, but the food over all is great and their cilantro salsa is WONDERFUL and not at all spicy. I could definitely find a cheaper texmex restaurant  elsewhere and be hotter food temperature wise, but the food from the truck is definitely on point!

name: Justin Williams
text:
Great food and friendly staff!

The a la carte menu is a great change. You can pick your own mix for lunch or dinner and get exactly what you want. The Russian Roulette is excellent with pork. It's hot, but the flavors come through without being overpowered by the heat.

Thanks for another delicious meal. Fire and Spice is one of my top three favorite places to dine.

name: John Madderra
text: Barbecue brussels sprouts rock!

name: Moose Trust
text: Good food but bring back the salads!

name: Dean Cooper
text: Very tasty tacos 🌮!!

name: Philip Busk
text: Excellent. I had the Lone Star tacos and thought the flavors were wonderful; just the right amount of spicy. Friendly, clean, fast. They took the time to make sure we were enjoying our meal.

name: Matthew Jaeger
text: Great brisket and salsa verde! You've gotta try it!

name: Michael Morris
text: Have eaten here a number of times and staff is always friendly.  Food has been very good and is a good serving size.  Really like the green salsa service with chips.  Love the tacos.  Good selection of local beers.

name: Randy Bafford
text: Great service and really good food also really clean thanks for everything

name: Philip Busk
text: Excellent. I had the Lone Star tacos and thought the flavors were wonderful; just the right amount of spicy. Friendly, clean, fast. They took the time to make sure we were enjoying our meal.

name: Shelly Tanner
text: I have been wanting to try this place forever....my new Chiropractor is two doors down from them. So today went in ordered a Longhorn salad(I'm gluten free) I was surprised at the bowl being smaller, with mainly spring Lettuce mix, the brisket 🤔 was dry (sigh, dry brisket)  I'm talking a spinkle of cheese. It was $10.20 with tax. I would post a picture but it's not giving the option.

resp.text: I’m sorry that your salad was disappointing. Our salad bowls are industry standard 32oz bowls filled with 6 oz of brisket along with other fillings. Our brisket salad does not come with typical cheese, it’s just a dusting of cotija. With that being said we would be more than happy to take care of you next time you come in. Being gluten free is not an issue here as we serve corn tortillas and corn tortilla chips along with many other gluten free items that are not salads. Hope you gives us another try and ask for the owner next time you are in.

name: Jolene Dean
text: Good grub.. But be prepared for indigestion!   It was worth it.  Took a star away because the fried pickles had so little pickle, they tasted like deep fried batter.

name: Stephen R
text:
The food and atmosphere here is great. Love the vegan options, especially the quesadilla, lots of flavor

One star off because sometimes getting food or ordering to go takes a while. Worth the hassle but would love to have speedier too

name: Michael Morris
text: Have eaten here a number of times and staff is always friendly.  Food has been very good and is a good serving size.  Really like the green salsa service with chips.  Love the tacos.  Good selection of local beers.

name: Will Payne
text: The fish tacos, aka Finding Nemo, are delicious. Spicy slaw is so good on these tacos! Clean restaurant. Friendly and fast service. HIGHLY recommend this place. There food truck is on point, too.

name: Moose Trust
text: Good food but bring back the salads!

name: Cary Long
text: Very good BBQ. The BBQ Brussels work great. Had bacon and BBQ sauce on them. We will be back.

name: Ashley Marlar
text: Went to Fire and Spice for the first time tonight. Service was super fast, and staff were very friendly. Among our group we ordered tacos, a burrito, brisket plate, and pulled pork plate. Everything was very good and tasted fresh. Don't miss out on the cheesecake chimichanga! We plan to go back soon and try their brunch menu.

name: Kris Kasprzak
text: I thought the food here was very good. Daughter ordered the smoked brisket and it was unbelievable. I would definitely go back and recommend this place.

name: Amy Clemente
text: Service and food on point.  Great place for some awesome mexican food.  Burritos and nachos were on point.

name: k wohl
text: Yesterday my wife and I had the Texan (3 pulled pork tacos) and a side of adobo rice.  The tacos came with chips and salsa and were delicious, as was the rice.  The restaurant was very clean and the staff was very friendly and helpful.  I had been there last week and had a Rodeo burrito for carryout, and it was also delicious.  We will be back.

name: Shae Reeves
text: Great food but they did mess my order up. Also I called in my order and they said 10-15 min. I went there 25 minutes later and my food was still not ready

name: Penny Wetterer
text: Best part was the waitress was friendly. The chicken was very dry and no flavor. Brisket had no smoke flavor. Pulled pork was greasy and had no taste other than the grease. Kids were not a fan of the small selection of soda, since there was no fountain drinks. The soda bottle drinks are 2.50 per bottle.

name: Jeremy Childers
text: While it took a while to get our food(they were busy), the food was delicious and the service was friendly.  I had several tacos, one of which had texas brisket on it.  It was the best taco I have ever had and I have visited Mexico, southern cali and lived in Texas.

name: George Olden
text: Great food and drinks. There is a decent beer selection for such a small place.  I recommend trying the brisket or anything with the chorizo.  Also, they are willing to kick the spice level up and add habeneros to your dish.

name: christian collins
text:
So let me say today i have literally had my standard of mac and cheese raised dramatically.
Over time I've tried this locations food and for price it is solid but what will always keep me coming back is the flavor on any item on their menu.
Every thing tastes like there is true care when preparing these dishes and it impresses me everytime i get the privilege to eat there.

name: Briana Garrison
text: Excellent Texas and Mexican fusion. NOT TEX-MEX.

name: Jason Wiersma (Karmicbrutality)
text: Amazing Food and Great People, they turn it up to 11. Five stars is not nearly enough.

name: Nathan Childers
text: Great place to try, you won’t be disappointed. The staff is super friendly, the restaurant is very clean and most importantly the food is fantastic. My favorite thing I order is the brisket sandwich add house made pickles. This is the best sandwich I have ever had.

name: Lane Martin
text: Good food with a nice twist. Great service.

name: Jason Wiersma (Karmicbrutality)
text: Amazing Food and Great People, they turn it up to 11. Five stars is not nearly enough.

name: Anne Flatcher
text: I witnessed the manager yelling at a crew member and that’s just so disrespectful and totally ruined me and my daughters lunch. Food was decent but too expensive.

resp.text: This matter has been taken very seriously, as of tonight that team member was let go because of that accident. Thank you for brining it to our attention and we will thrive to do better

name: April Scott
text: Love this place! The food is delicious!!

name: Linda Powell
text: Sarah is awesome and friendly. Ordered lamb tacos and their side of mac & cheese.  A little overcooked on the lamb, but they were still delicious. The mac & cheese, was to die for.

name: Christy Olszewski
text: Food was awesome! Environment was fun! I love how fresh everything tasted!! It was our first time & we will definitely be going back!

name: Amy Kibbey
text: My fiesta chicken rice bowl was great!  It had just the right amount of heat.  The menu has a wide variety of choices.  I want to go back and try other things.

name: Ian Kinner
text: The food here is incredibly good. The custom piper and leaf tea was amazing. I'm glad we got an awesome new place in South Huntsville!

name: Angela Grant
text: Pineapple Jalepeno Margarita!!! Delicious!!! The brisket is soooo tender!!!

name: josh whisenant
text: food was really good, but was on the high side 4.50 for a 6" taco is kinda steep

name: Nathan Childers
text: Great place to try, you won’t be disappointed. The staff is super friendly, the restaurant is very clean and most importantly the food is fantastic. My favorite thing I order is the brisket sandwich add house made pickles. This is the best sandwich I have ever had.

name: Jason Zarrilli
text: Went in for take out and was very impressed. Location is clean and the staff was very accommodating. Provided guidance for a first time customer. Food was fantastic and packed very well for take out. Looking forward to my next visit.

name: William Dodd
text: The food is always really good. Not as good as the food truck, but still good. I had the southern belle, original gangsta, and mahi tacos this last visit.

name: Andrew Judge
text: Fantastic food and excellent service! Muy caliente!

name: Jennifer Taylor
text: Amazing restaurant and staff!

name: The Life
text: Fast service

name: Kristi Kendall
text: Great food and super fast service. They are happy to accommodate my weird requests and always pay special attention to ingredients for me! Food is always fresh and perfect!

name: Markie Leigh
text: Great food, great service!

name: Miranda Kennedy
text:
over 60 bucks and the food is nasty the mac and cheese is done in the microwave .
We will never be back

resp.text: Thank you for the kind comment and supporting local during these times. Just a heads up, we do not have a microwave anywhere on premises, but we appreciate the kind words

name: Michael D'Auben
text: Fast friendly service and the food was amazing.  I can't wait to go back again.

name: laurie wright
text: Really good food but portions are too small for the price you pay

resp.text: Our apologies for the small portion served. If there was an issue we would have loved to take care of it at that moment. We hope that you gives us another try at a later date

name: Andrew Taylor
text: Huntsville has a lot of great food, but Fire & Spice stands out. The food is delicious and unique with good combinations of great ingredients. Tonight I got the pulled pork sandwich. Most have ok meat, slathered with sauce because it has no flavor, and thrown on a cheap bun. Not Fire & Spice! Their meat tastes great, mixed with slaw to give it a great crunch, on top of perfect Texas toast. I had a side of poblano potato salad (which isn't ruined with relish!) and a dessert of their amazing pecan pie topped with ice cream. And the presentation of each fish was amazing. Are you hungry yet? I can't wait to go back.

name: Jennifer Taylor
text: Amazing restaurant and staff!

name: Bradley Dean
text: I’ve enjoyed everything I’ve ordered there. I’m a big fan of spicy food. Awesome success story from food truck to a restaurant location.

name: Markie Leigh
text: Great food, great service!

name: Ray Toth
text: As usual, excellent food.  If you like their food truck then you need to get to their location on South Parkway.  Not one thing in the menu that hasn't been fantastic so far!

name: Chris Turner
text: Fresh, fast and delicious. The sides are very good as well. New vegan menu and BBQ. Good local craft  beer selection. If you want delicious fresh Tex-Mex, this is your place.

name: Calvin Fox
text: I ordered the 256 nachos with no guacamole or cilantro, and the staff gave me the salsa in a little cup so I could choose whether or not I wanted it (Because it had cilantro). The food was delicious and the staff was thoughtful.

name: VBCMEDIC
text: Great place, great staff and delicious food!!!

name: William Kaukler
text: Got signature fire and spice burrito and while good, not hot nor spicy. Had to add sirracha for each bite. Ingredients suggest spicy but those were lacking but lots of meat and rice. Came for heat because of name.

name: Thomas Roberson
text: Terrible service. They had advertised 3 tacos and a side for 10 dollars and when I tried to order they wouldn’t let me order that and my bill for 3 tacos and a side was about 20 dollars. Worst service ever. False advertisement and overall bad experience.

resp.text: Our apologies. If you came on any other day but a taco Tuesday then the deal does not apply. With that being said the service was an issue lately and the cause of that was removed. We will do better job next time. And for that you can get a free meal on us next time you are in. And you will be taken care of by an owner personally

name: William Kaukler
text: Got signature fire and spice burrito and while good, not hot nor spicy. Had to add sirracha for each bite. Ingredients suggest spicy but those were lacking but lots of meat and rice. Came for heat because of name.

name: Ray Toth
text: As usual, excellent food.  If you like their food truck then you need to get to their location on South Parkway.  Not one thing in the menu that hasn't been fantastic so far!

name: Bradley Garrison
text: Love this place. Good atmosphere, and great food!

name: Jenna Dow
text: Great vegan menu :)

name: willyb
text: Taco Tuesday.  Three different tacos $10.  Great selection. I am a fish taco guy but the brisket is so good.  You need to try it!

name: Virginia Esslinger
text: Best BRISKET in town

name: Courtney Parker
text: We couldn't decide where to eat, so we kept driving and seen this restaurant. We gave it a try and it was awesome. Staff was friendly and helped us. We will definitely be back!

name: Katie Davis
text: Really yummy. I got the fire and spice burrito with smoked chicken. Perfect amount of spice. Husband got lone star tacos and the brisket was delicious. Will def go back.

name: Tonya Johnson (Sunshine)

I have tried different items and they all have been great.  When talking with my waitress, she suggested that next time that I try the Southern Belle Taco which is fried Chicken, pimento cheese, bacon, jalapeno jelly, green onions, and chipotle sauce

text:
I drove all the way from meridianville to south parkway to see what this place way about. I’ve always seen them down my IG timeline (_tourdefat) , and i was like man I’ve gotta try them on my cheat day one day. Low & behold i don’t  regret driving down to this restaurant.
First the service is great, AND the place doesn’t smell weird like most restaurants. I got a great 2 in one with this restaurant.
Secondly, the menu is so nice and simple PLUS the food is actually good and flavorful.
Pictured here i have the fiesta chicken bowl. This is better than moes, chipotle, qudoba (for anyone from up north), this thing is so delicious and hefty. Usually I have a mans appetite and can eat something like this in one sitting but not this time! Worth the drive, money, & time!
Definitely visit here, so worth it!

name: Joy Grace
text: A friend of mine went with me & we walked inside & was not sure what to do at all-there needs to be a sign saying to order at the counter before sitting down. We got our food before they even brought our drinks to us & when we ordered desert- they said they had turned off the fryer cause they were closing soon-so we didn't get desert.  The people were friendly but just seemed very unprofessional. We won't be returning for sure & I would NOT recommend that store to anyone.

resp.text:
Good Evening Joy,
Let me start off by apologizing for this horrible experience. This is not the Fire & Spice way and as owners we are shocked and appalled by how you and your friend were treated. Even though it definitely wasn’t you’re ideal evening, I want to thank you for bringing it to our attention. Without being told about issues there would be no way of knowing what we need to focus on, so thank you. We would like to know what night you and your friend came in so we know who to personally address and retrain. Also, please accept our deepest apologies and offer for a free meal on us. We understand if you’re hesitant on coming back anytime soon, but please trust me when I say this shouldn’t happen again.
Our email address is: firespicefoodtruck@gmail.com
Please feel free to contact us so we can work together on helping us become better. Thank you again.

text:
Going to give them another chance, of course...please don’t let me down Taco Bell!
I saw a whole bunch of 5/4 ⭐️ recent reviews and Inhope they are accurate and not just to bring their online rating up...we shall see...I will update after my visit.

You know for a long time I prayed for a Taco Bell to come to Randolph County.  Now we
have one, it has just continued to go downhill no matter how many times I give the Roanoke Taco Bell another chance!!  This time, like every one of the last three times I visited, the order was messed up!   This time I got what I ordered by name, but three little pieces of steak on the steak nachos and less than a half container of LIMP nacho fries and a reheated taco salad does NOT make a decent meal.  And yes, the line was moving like a snail...I thought maybe it was the guy up ahead ordering, but I am tired of making excuses for this Taco Bell!!!  Other Taco Bells don't have such crappy service and food!   Management,  if you are worth anything, figure out "who" the problems are and correct/fire them.  Here's a pic of the order of nacho fries, you be the judge...
Ps.  I'm the one that gave you a 4 Star rating right after you opened...smh.

Service was a little slow. Apparently they were having computer issues that day. Will definitely try again to see if it improves. Food was excellent and exactly as ordered.

Edit: after a few weeks I was able to go back and retry this Taco Bell. Was definitely not impressed the second time around. Slower than the first time, and the restaurant was in bad need of some janitorial services. Trash all over the floor, tables that needed wiping down, and the staff was seemingly unconcerned with it. Definitely will not recommend this store until management has dealt with the problems.

They would give me a time to call back but then they would never answer!!!! Isn't this against the law.... I mean withholding my W2?!?!?!?!?
